document_data.name: Flambos Axemaster
document_data.mainbody: '''Flambos Axemaster''' was a [[ranger]] and follower of [[Mielikki]] inhabiting [[Waterdeep]], City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Flambos enjoyed exploring the various [[tavern]]s and [[inn]]s, both lavish and squalid, within the entire expanse of Waterdeep. He roamed the [[High Moor]], ridding the area of wicked creatures until he required supplies or healing, at which point he returned to the City of Splendors. He would offer his [[sword]] or services as a guide to kindly travelers for 1 [[sp]] per day and a share of any treasure acquired during their adventures. Flambos tithed a fair amount of treasure to the shrine of Mielikki in Waterdeep.
